name: Jetpack Kong Revolution
description:
Don't call him monkey or he'll be offended. He's known as Jetpack Kong who just invented his own Jetpack and ready for his adventure, from escaping the Evil Zoo's Lab to dominating the World.

🚀 HOW TO PLAY: use your 2 Thumbs, simply tap left and/or right to fly and turn. Avoid obstacles and hazards such as wrecking balls, traps and snares, collect Coins, Gems and other items on the way.

4 GAME MODES:
🚀 Arcade: many fun Levels in 3 beautiful magical Worlds.
🚀 Endless: see how far you can go and compare with other players.
🚀 Time Attack: challenge yourself with the clock ticking.
🚀 Inferno: escaping from hell, spooky graveyard.

SPECIAL FEATURES:
🚀 Halloween, Winter, Holiday, Christmas special themes.
🚀 Original Gameplay with 36 levels.
🚀 Bonus and Mini Games.
🚀 Beautiful Themes, graphics and fun animations.
🚀 Family and Kid Friendly.
🚀 Google Leaderboards, Achievements and Quests.
🚀 Options to login with Facebook, share your score and invite friends.
🚀 Languages: English, Español, Français, Deutsch, Português, Italiano, Русский язык, 日本語, 한국어, Tiếng Việt and 中文.

CREDITS:
🚀 Arts by Emily Quynh Phan.
🚀 Animations by Dao Luong.
🚀 Music and Sounds by April Gee.

HAPPY HALLOWEEN!!!
